title: The Road Home
description: Charis Auberlane knows how to get what he wants, and what he wants is to see his dad. Unfortunately, his 'abduction' could start a war if Kastor doesn't get him back to his mother pretty damn quick.Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 118,926 Art credit: http://richoll.deviantart.com/art/Kas...
author: Jesse Hajicek
